job_description:
If you are a self-confident, self-motivated person with a strong work ethic and excellent communication skills and you enjoy a fast-paced team-driven environment, contact us today!

Working with one of the top clients this role calls for a Senior Full Stack Java Developer. The ideal candidate has strong hands-on experience with PowerBI and SAP Excel spreadsheets.

Desired Skill Set

10 – 12 years of experience in Java development
Solid exposure to V1.6 and understanding of this version to move them forward
Hands-on skills with full stack, front end and back-end technologies
Highly motivated self-starter and quick learner of new technologies
Strong organization & standardization skills with the ability to prioritize & multi-task.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (verbal and written)
Detail-oriented and high level of quality expectation

BeachHead is an equal opportunity agency and employer. We advocate for you and welcome anyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, physical or mental disability, or age.
